result.title: D1.1 Expert Advisory Panel operational
result.description:
DEEPEGS will establish and form an external expert panel. This international industry/scientific advisory panel of four high level persons from leading organisations in the field of geothermal energy and EGS. Additional external experts may be appointed ad-hoc as required to cover additional fields of expertise, reviewing project results and providing external inputs to the project. - An indpendent Ethics Advisor will be appointed as the fifth member of the EEP
To compliment this and for business case developments an additional list of other key European and international contacts for targeted communications will be established.
